text: In a certain place...
Specifically the headquarters of A-B-Gー

name: A-B-G Member
text: We have finally obtained you-know-what.

name: A-B-G Members
text: Uohhhhhhhhh!!!

name: A-B-G Member
text: Our final battle is upon us.

name: A-B-G Member
text: There will be only one chance.

name: A-B-G Member
text: And only one will be able to grasp victory.

name: A-B-G Member
text: Glory to the A-B-G!

name: A-B-G Members
text: Glory to the A-B-G!

name: Me
text: Hey, Sakura, you ready yet?

name: Sakura
text: Hmmm... should I go with this after all?

name: Sakura
text: Oh, but Clear-chan's coming today too. Then maybe something a bit more mature would be good...

name: Me
text: Sakura, get a move on.

name: Sakura
text: Geez, just wait!
Sakura grumbled, her eyes firmly fixed on the mirror before her.

name: Sakura
text: Do you think this looks better on me? Hmm... I think it's a little too flashy...

name: Me
text: What's taking you so long anyway? It's just clothes!

name: Sakura
text: Oh, come on. A girl's prep time is her time!
That day, we had plans to hang out with Yukikaze, Clear, Hebiko, and Shikanosuke.
But Sakura here was taking forever to choose her clothes even though we were already running late.

name: Me
text: I'm leaving you behind if you don't hurry it up.

name: Sakura
text: Oh, then can you go ahead for me, Fuma-kun?

name: Sakura
text: And tell everyone I'm sorry I'm going to be a little late. Thanks～
Sakura's words didn't sound the least bit apologetic as she returned to her little catwalk.

name: Me
text: This girl's hopeless...
I could just see Yukikaze's angry face pop up in my mind bitching if we didn't show up in time.

name: Me
text: Fine, but just make it quick.

name: Sakura
text: Got iiiit♪
She didn't sound like she got anything, but I just left her behind and headed out.
Our meetup spot was the usual Inageya.
The plan was to head into town and grab some lunch before seeing a movie together.
But the problem was that we had completely different tastes in movies. My favorite genre was historical films, Yukikaze loved action movies, and Hebiko's favorite was romance, unexpectedly.
Shikanosuke and Clear were into animated movies, and as for Sakura, she liked something more "surreal," even though I didn't really know what that meant.
I had a feeling that it would turn into a whole dispute over what to actually see.

name: Me
text: Well, it's not like we have to watch the same one together, though.
With such thoughts in mind, I was rushing to Inageya when...
A lone girl was running toward me from the opposite direction.
Her face was unfamiliar to me.
The girl kept looking over her shoulder as if she were being chased by someone.
But, there were no signs of fear on her face.

name: ？？？
text: ...Haah.
She was heaving listless sighs while occasionally glancing behind.

name: Me
text: (What's going on with her...?)
The question crossed my mind for a moment. But she was obviously not just any girl, considering how she'd been able to enter this village which was normally off-limits for outsiders.
It wasn't something I felt needed my intervention. After all, trouble was the only thing it could lead to.
I was so ready to walk by her, feigning as indifferent a look as possible, but...

name: ？？？
text: Oh, there you are.
Seeing my face, she decided to approach me on her own.
And the first words she had to say wereー

name: ？？？
text: Do you love me?

name: Me
text: What?

name: ？？？
text: Do you want to marry me?

name: Me
text: Umm, I don't think so.

name: ？？？
text: Good.
After she said so in a somewhat monotonous voice, the girl suddenly pulled my left arm close and hugged it as if she were my girlfriend.
The softness of the strange girl's modest breasts seeped into my upper armーno, I had to stay focused!

name: Me
text: H-Hey, what are you-?!
The moment I was about to ask her in panic...
*Rumble!*
*Rrrrrumble!!*
A crowd of Taimanin came stampeding from the direction she'd come.
There were so many of them. At least 20.
It was an eclectic assortment of Taimanin. From newbies to scouts, Fire, Wind, and Earth Arts users, and even Fuma ninja.
I could see some desperation in their faces. Were they all after that girl?

name: A-B-G Members
text: The A-B-G is here!!!

name: Me
text: The A-B-G?

name: A-B-G Member
text: Ange-chan! What on earth are you doing with that guy?!
One of the members of the Taimanin group, the A-B-G or whatever they were, sounded almost heartbroken as he asked.

name: A-B-G Member
text: Fuma! Explain yourself!!

name: A-B-G Member
text: How dare you flirt with our Ange-chan behind our back!?

name: A-B-G Member
text: How I env-... despise you, Fuma!!

name: Me
text: Even if you say that... I don't even know her...

name: A-B-G Member
text: What!? Y-You don't know Ange-chan?!

name: A-B-G Member
text: How daaaaare you!?

name: Me
text: At least I know your name now. Ange, isn't it?

name: Ange
text: Yes. Nice to meet you.

name: Me
text: Sheesh.

name: A-B-G Member
text: Fuma!! Stop sounding so intimate with her, asshole!!

name: A-B-G Member
text: You heard him!! Ange-chan is ours!

name: Me
text: (What's the deal with these guys...)

name: A-B-G Member
text: Ange-chan! What is that guy to you?! D-Don't tell me he's...!

name: Ange
text: He's my fiance.

name: Me
text: Wha!? Hey what're youー
*Slither!!*

name: Me
text: Ughhh!?

name: Me
text: (A tentacle!?)
A tentacle came out from Ange's back and gagged my mouth before I could finish my question.

name: A-B-G Member
text: Your fiance!?

name: A-B-G Member
text: Ange-chan! No way!!

name: A-B-G Member
text: Tell me this is a lie!! Pleeeeeeeease!!!
The crowd of weirdos let out a cry of despair in unison.
Some were soullessly staring at the sky, some collapsed to their knees, and others wept bitterly. I still wasn't sure what was going on, but their reactions were intense.
And not only that, they even began to vilify me all at once.

name: A-B-G Member
text: You Diot! I won't forgive you!

name: A-B-G Member
text: What did you do to our Ange-chan!?

name: Me
text: Ahmmh-mngh-amh!! (I didn't do anything!!)

name: A-B-G Member
text: You're dead meat!

name: Ange
text: I'm going to marry him. So, please forget about me.

name: Me
text: Hmh-mmmmmhhh! (Who's gonna marry who now!?)
As much as I wanted to protest, my mouth was completely covered by the tentacle.

name: A-B-G Member
text: I can't let you marry such a man! You're going to marry me! I'll make it happen with this!!
One of the A-B-G members took out a suspicious pot.
Sinister patterns were engraved all over the surface, and its lid was sealed by a cursed talisman.
From east to west, from ancient times to today, it was generally accepted that those kinds of pots were always filled with trouble.

name: Ange
text: Ah, this might be bad.
Ange spoke in a flat voice devoid of urgency, her tentacle still covering my mouth.

name: Me
text: Mgh, mmm! Mmmmmghh!(What's that mean?! Hey, you fool! Stop it!!)

name: A-B-G Member
text: O, great one, come forth! Grant me my wish!!
That fool peeled the seal off without hesitation.
*Fwoooooooooosh!!*
*Twinkle, twinkle*
Something came out spectacularly from the pot while spreading dazzling sparkles of light everywhere.

name: ？？？
text: Geez! Shuddup! Shudduuuuuuup!!
What appeared was a beautiful young girl, the very picture of displeasure.

name: A-B-G Member
text: Ohh! The Goddess Juno is here!!!

name: Me
text: (Juno!? One of the ancient gods who presides over marriage!? Sh-She looks totally different from how I'd imagine but is she the real deal!?)
If she was, that meant that she was a monster on a mythological level, or rather, a god.
Did they really summon such a thing?

name: Juno
text: What's with you guys? Do you have the slightest idea how annoying it is to be summoned so suddenly?
Looking around and glaring at us, Juno spoke in a grumpy voice.
However, in contrast to her irritated demeanor, a glorious halo of divine light was emanating from her whole body.

name: A-B-G Member
text: Ohh, great Goddess! It was I who summoned you!!

name: Juno
text: Well? What d'you need?

name: A-B-G Member
text: Goddess Juno!!! Please make Ange-chan marry me!!!

name: A-B-G Member
text: No, Juno-sama! Please make her marry me!!

name: A-B-G Member
text: Don't be ridiculous!! I'm the one who should marry Ange-chan!!

name: A-B-G Member
text: No, it has to be me! I'm gonna marry her!

name: A-B-G Member
text: No, it's me!!!

name: Juno
text: Hmm, so you all wanna marry that girl, huh?

name: A-B-G Members
text: Goddess Juno-sama, please!!!

name: Juno
text: No can do.
Juno rejected the fools' wishes easily.

name: A-B-G Member
text: Ehhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!? But why, Goddess Juno!?

name: Juno
text: Huh!? Why do I always have to give my blessings to someone's marriage!?

name: A-B-G Member
text: B-But, isn't that your duty, Juno-sama?

name: Juno
text: "Duty?" I couldn't care less about duty! It's such a pain. And besides, it doesn't even mean anything!

name: A-B-G Member
text: J-Juno-sama!

name: A-B-G Member
text: Please!! Just this once! Just for Ange-chan and me!!

name: A-B-G Members
text: Please!! Juno-sama!!!
The group of annoying fools all began to prostrate themselves before Juno.

name: Juno
text: You guys are seriously the most annoying humans, like, ever...
That was true.
Juno's gaze had been as cold as ice for a while, but then, she playfully raised the corners of her lips and said...

name: Juno
text: If you want my blessing so bad...
Juno suddenly looked at Ange and me, and held out her hands toward us.

name: Juno
text: I'll give my blessing to you guys!

name: Ange
text: Huh?

name: Me
text: (W-Wait!!)
Ever so gentle light emanated from the palms of the goddess and soon enveloped us.

name: Me
text: (Wh-What the... Holy light!?)
The warm light was so dazzling that I couldn't help but close my eyes, and at that moment...

name: Ange
text: Ah...
The view that unfolded before my eyes was beyond my imagination.

name: Me
text: (What is thiiiiiiiis!!?)
Ange's clothes had turned into a white wedding dress,
and I was clad in a crisp tuxedo.

name: Ange
text: They changed.

name: Me
text: (Why are you so calm! And why am I in a tuxedo!? What the hell is going on!?)
I couldn't believe it.
She was the real deal; the Goddess Juno!!

name: A-B-G Members
text: Uwoooooooooooooooo!!

name: A-B-G Member
text: Ange-chan, wedding dress version!!

name: A-B-G Member
text: S-So cuuuuute! Cuteness overloaaaaaaaaaaad!!!
The group of fools that had been prostrating themself before the goddess let out screams of joy for a moment as if they'd lost their mind,
but then realizing that I had been chosen to be her groom, they began to raise hell.

name: A-B-G Member
text: What!? Fuma is her groom!?

name: A-B-G Member
text: Don't be ridiculous! What's going on!!

name: A-B-G Member
text: Juno-sama, why!? Why did you make him Ange-chan's groom!?

name: Juno
text: Well, because that guy didn't look like he wanted to marry her at allー

name: Juno
text: Think of it as payback for summoning me so suddenly, kyaahahahaha!!
Oh, she was a twisted goddess.
Wasn't she supposed to protect people's marriage lives?
Could it have been that she ended up sealed in that pot because of her vicious personality?

name: Juno
text: Well? How's your blessing from Goddess Juno?

name: Me
text: Mrgh... Screw you! That's not a blessing! That's harassment!!!

name: Juno
text: Huh?? Whatever do you mean??
I pushed down the tentacle covering my mouth and shouted at the laughing goddess, but she seemed unfazed.

name: Ange
text: This has taken a turn. Let's run for it.
The urgency of her words again not matching her monotone voice, Ange twined her tentacle around my body and lifted me up.

name: Me
text: Hey, wait!
There was no point in running away in this nonsensical situation.
And to top it all off, one who had the worst possible timing decided to appear before us...

name: Sakura
text: Sorry, Fuma-kun. Were you waiting long?
It was Sakura.
After all the fuss she'd made, she was wearing her usual school uniform.
No, that wasn't the important bit here.

name: Sakura
text: Ehhhhhh? What's with that tux!? And you've even got yourself a bride?!

name: Sakura
text: Well, who is she? Your girlfriend? Wait, you're getting married? I didn't even get an invite! What's going on!?
That's exactly what I wanted to know!!

name: Ange
text: Boi～ng
Ange had already used her tentacle like a spring to escape the scene before I could even explain this situation to Sakura.

name: Sakura
text: Hey! Fuma-kun! Miss Bride? Where are you going!? Is it time for the ceremony? Wait for meeeeeee!!
That was how I ended up leaving the scene, undoubtedly giving Sakura the spectacularly wrong idea.

name: Ange
text: Boi～ng, boi～ng, boi～ng
Using her tentacles, Ange was leaping from roof to roof at high speed as she made funny sounds.
Obviously, she was not human. She had tentacles growing from her back, to begin with.
More so than that, this whole marriage situation was entirely abnormal.

name: Me
text: Hey! Stop already!! You can't just kidnap a person like this!! Let me down!! Right now!

name: Ange
text: You want me to stop?
Ange gave me a quizzical look as her tentacle still held me tight.

name: Me
text: Yes!!

name: Ange
text: OK.
To my surprise, Ange immediately landed on the ground.

name: Ange
text: They'll catch us if we don't run.

name: Me
text: Why the chase in the first place? Who the hell are they!?

name: Ange
text: I'm not sure, but maybe my fan club or something.
Ange tilted her head to one side.

name: Me
text: Huh? A fan club?

name: Ange
text: The A-B-G. It stands for Ange Bodyguard Guild... I think? Have you ever heard of it?

name: Me
text: No, I've never heard of those idiots!

name: Ange
text: I see. So they aren't famous... I see.

name: Me
text: Of course not! God they just let anyone be Taimanin these daysーwait, who are you anyway?

name: Ange
text: Me? I'm Ange.
Ange introduced herself again, however, she didn't say anything besides her name.

name: Me
text: That's it!? I mean like where'd you come from, or why you're here!? Nothing!? Or do you have some reason you can't tell me anything!?

name: Ange
text: Ohh, that's what you meant. Ok, I've come here as an ambassador from the UFS.
Ange answered obediently.
At least it didn't seem like she was hiding her identity.

name: Me
text: A UFS ambassador? Well, putting that aside for now... What's the meaning of this!?

name: Ange
text: This? What?

name: Me
text: This! These clothes! And all the nonsense about our marriage and stuff!

name: Ange
text: Oh, this isー
When Ange was finally about to start her explanation...

name: Me
text: Ugh!?
I felt an overwhelming murderous aura from behind.

name: Clear
text: Fuma, that girl, who?
I looked back over my shoulder to see Clear standing there with a grimace.

name: Me
text: Wha-!?
Looking around in panic, I found myself standing before our meeting spot at Inageya.
Naturally, Yukikaze was with her. They must have come together from their mansion.

name: Yukikaze
text: Fuma... Care to explain why you've shown up with a strange girl in that ridiculous getup?
I couldn't tell from her expression if she was amused or angry. Or maybe she just wanted to send me flying as the sparks intimidatingly flew from her whole body.

name: Me
text: Th-This is, umm...
I had no idea how to explain.
Hell, I was the one trying to squeeze an explanation out of Ange just now.
However, despite being the whole reason we were in this mess, Ange simply looked around absentmindedly.

name: Yukikaze
text: I see. So, you can't tell us, huh?

name: Clear
text: You had secret?
I was at a loss for words for just a moment, but Yukikaze and Clear's faces became even grimmer.

name: Me
text: W-Wait! You got it all wrong! I don't even know what's going onー
As I floundered to try and find an explanation...

name: Sakura
text: Fuma-kun! Fuma-kun! Are you gonna marry that girl?

name: Sakura
text: I heard from this Juno girl how you've got a blessing from a goddess!
Sakura caught up with us and added fresh oil to the flames.

name: Yukikaze
text: Marry? No way!

name: Clear
text: Fuma, get married?

name: Sakura
text: I know right? The shock of the century!

name: Me
text: No, no!! I am not getting married!!
As hard as I shouted in denial, Ange seemed unable to bear the intimidating gazes from the three of them anymore and said...

name: Ange
text: Yup, he's marrying me.

name: Me
text: Ahhhgh! What on earth are you saying!!

name: Ange
text: I'll be in trouble otherwise.

name: Me
text: I'm gonna be in bigger trouble here!

name: Ange
text: Then, what should I do...?

name: Me
text: Beats me!!
As I had this back-and-forth with Ange, I heard an eerie, buzzing sound.
I reflexively looked in that direction and saw Clear holding her activated blade and shield.

name: Me
text: H-Hey, Clear, what are you thinking?

name: Clear
text: Exterminating those who harm Fuma is my mission.
Clear had suddenly said something pretty crazy. She could actually make things quite dangerous here.
I was almost in a panic, not knowing what to do.
And in that momentー

name: Me
text: Huh?
I found myself putting my arm around Ange's waist and pulling her close.

name: Ange
text: Woah.
Ange was surprised.
As was I.

name: Me
text: (H-Have I lost it!?)

name: Clear
text: Annoyed.

name: Yukikaze
text: And? What's that for then?

name: Sakura
text: Wow, Fuma-kun, no need to showboat.

name: Me
text: N-No, this is just, my hand moved on itsー

name: Juno
text: Ahahahahahahah! Now that you've received my blessing, your body automatically tries to protect your bride♪
That wicked goddess appeared out of nowhere and proudly proclaimed with the dazzling light illuminating her from behind.

name: Juno
text: Once I bless your marriage, nobody can get in your way anymore!

name: Me
text: Damn you!

name: Juno
text: Best wishes?! Kyaahahahaha!!
Juno disappeared as she cackled.

name: Clear
text: I won't let you marry Fuma.

name: Yukikaze
text: I don't care who Fuma dates or marries, but it's kinda irritating to see him show off like this.

name: Sakura
text: We spent so much time playing video games together, and you didn't think to tell me about your fiance at all? Fuma-kun deserves a little beating, doesn't he?♪

name: Me
text: Wait, everyone! This is all that goddess's fault! Just listen to me! Argh, what am I doing!?
Though I was trying to calm down the three of them, my body moved on its own to pull Ange even closer, which wasn't helping my case.

name: Me
text: Oh shit, run!
I shouted at Ange, who was now firmly held in my arms.

name: Ange
text: Why?

name: Me
text: Just because!

name: Ange
text: OK.
I had a feeling that running away would cause even more misunderstanding, but I didn't have any other choices.

name: Ange
text: Then hold on tight. Boi～ng!
Ange used her tentacles like springs and made an even bigger jump than before.

name: Clear
text: They ran.

name: Yukikaze
text: Fuma, get back here!

name: Sakura
text: Running isn't very man-like you know!!
As I had expected, with all these misunderstandings the three were about to give chase. But suddenly we heard a shout.

name: A-B-G Member
text: Damn youuuuuuu!!

name: A-B-G Member
text: You won't escape us, Fuma!!

name: A-B-G Member
text: Wait for me, Ange-chaaaaaaan!!

name: A-B-G Member
text: Marry meeeeeeeeee!
Some A-B-G members caught up with us and blocked the way of the three of them.

name: Yukikaze
text: Woah, what's with these guys!? Hey, move it! Come on, they're getting away!!

name: Sakura
text: I'm not really sure, but it seems like these guys are also after them.

name: Clear
text: I will chase. They can't escape.

name: Me
text: Phew, looks like we lost them for now. Damn, that nasty-ass goddess!

name: Ange
text: I'm sure she's lost her mind because she blessed too many people's marriages.

name: Me
text: I don't think so. She must be a born and bred perverse.

name: Ange
text: Really?

name: Me
text: Juno from Roman mythology is the same god as Hera from Greek mythology.

name: Me
text: Hera also controls marriage, but she is known for being extremely jealous and a troublemaker. That's her true nature for sure... damn it!

name: Ange
text: You know a lot.

name: Me
text: I just like myths and history. But more importantly, what do we do about this situation? What's this outfit anyway?
I looked down at the tuxedo that perfectly fit my body as if it had been tailored.

name: Ange
text: It looks good on you.

name: Me
text: I'm not happy, you know.

name: Ange
text: I'm kind of happy. I've never dressed like this.
Ange spun around as she checked how she looked in her wedding dress.
Her pure white dress beautifully contrasted against the green hill where we stood. And as the hem of her dress dreamily fluttered, my heart skipped a beat for a moment.

name: Ange
text: What do you think?

name: Me
text: Ohー
Adorable.
I almost blurted it out loud.
Wait wait wait! Why was I even feeling that way!?
She was the one who dragged me into this in the first place.
Was it because of the blessing of that wicked goddess?
Could my feelings have even been influenced by it?

name: Ange
text: What's wrong?

name: Me
text: N-Nothing. Anyway, we've got to do something about this or it's gonna get worー

name: Hebiko
text: Fuma-chan, are you getting married!? You didn't tell Hebiko anything!!

name: Me
text: Woah!?
Now even Hebiko showed up!?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Fuma, is it true that you're gonna get married!? When did you get a girlfriend to begin with?
And there was Shikanosuke!!
They found out too!?
And a crowd of A-B-G members were closing in from the rear.

name: A-B-G Members
text: Wait for uuuuuuuus!! Ange-chaaaaaan!

name: A-B-G Members
text: Fuma, this is unforgivableeee!!

name: Hebiko
text: Fuma-chan! Hebiko doesn't even know that girl! And in those outfits!?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Yeah! Talk about a dress-up! Are you two having the ceremony here?

name: Hebiko
text: The ceremony? Here!? Is that true, Fuma-chan!?

name: Me
text: As if!!
I shouted in denial, but not only did they not seem to listen to me, but my body also moved on its own to protect Ange again.

name: Ange
text: Squeeeze.
And to make matters worse, Ange naturally let me do it because of the effect of the blessing.

name: Hebiko
text: Geeez! Now he's just showing off his briiiiiiiide!!

name: Shikanosuke
text: So cool! Fuma, you look like a film star now!!

name: Me
text: This is going nowhere! Run!!

name: Ange
text: We're running again?

name: Me
text: YES!

name: Ange
text: OK, if you say so.

name: Yukikaze
text: Hold it right there, Fuma!! Stop running!! You're under arrest!

name: Me
text: What do you mean by "under arrest!?" I didn't do anything!

name: Yukikaze
text: Child marriage is a crime, you pedophile!

name: Me
text: Who's a pedophile?!

name: Hebiko
text: As class representative, Hebiko can't overlook child marriage!

name: Me
text: I told you this isn't like that!!

name: A-B-G Members
text: We're not giving up Ange-chan to you!!!

name: Me
text: Stop messing around already! Whose fault do you think this is in the first place!?

name: A-B-G Member
text: Shut up!! You should be happy with that flat chest and octopus!!

name: Yukikaze
text: Flat chest!!?
*Bzzzzbzzzzzbzzzzbzzz!!*

name: A-B-G Members
text: Arghhhhhhhhhhhh!!

name: Hebiko
text: Hey, don't be so rude to Hebiko!
*Fwoooooosh!!*

name: A-B-G Member
text: Urghhhhhhhhhhhhh!!

name: A-B-G Member
text: Ange-chaaaan!! Please, today is the last chance for meeeeee!!

name: Sakura
text: Wonder what "last chance" means?

name: Clear
text: Don't care. They're in my way.
*Slassssssh!!*

name: A-B-G Member
text: Arghhhhhhhhh!! A-Ange-chan... ughh!!

name: Ange
text: This has turned into quite the uproar, hasn't it?

name: Me
text: And whose fault might that be?!

name: Me
text: Haah, haah, haah... Look, it's already getting dark...

name: Ange
text: What should we do?

name: Me
text: Let's hide somewhere in the school building. Once we do that we're gonna have a nice long talk about everything. Got it?

name: Ange
text: Okay.
After running all over the place in this continually deteriorating situation, we finally arrived at the school. However, waiting for us there was...

name: Sakura
text: Ahhhhh?, it's Fuma-kun!

name: Me
text: Woah, Sakura-sensei!

name: Murasaki
text: You even brought her with you? Oh my, nice tuxedo.

name: Me
text: Murasaki-sensei, too?!
Sakura-sensei and Murasaki-sensei had just come out of the school building.
I had a feeling things could get complicated again...

name: Sakura
text: Fuma-kun, Fuma-kun. I heard you're gonna get married♪ Is that true?

name: Sakura
text: But running around in that wedding dress and tuxedo? Well, I think it's too much. I know you look cool though, ahaha?.

name: Murasaki
text: Yes. If you're thinking of tying the knot, you'd be better off not being so reckless.

name: Murasaki
text: If you make her run around like that, you'll mess up her wedding dress. You shouldn't disappoint your bride.

name: Me
text: N-No, you got it wrong. This is...
Even they knew about my marriage.
And they also seemed to have already accepted it at that.
It was gonna be a real pain in the ass to clear this upー

name: A-B-G Member
text: Fumaaaaaaaaa!!!

name: A-B-G Member
text: You can't get away with thiiiiiiiiiis!!!

name: A-B-G Member
text: Ange-chaaaaaaaan!!

name: Ange
text: It's them again.

name: Me
text: Come on!? How many fans do you have!?

name: Ange
text: I don't know.

name: Sakura
text: Woah. What is that, an army!?

name: Murasaki
text: An enemy attack? No, they are Taimainin. Looks like they're calling you, Fuma.

name: Me
text: Damn, it's not safe here either!

name: Ange
text: Let's go.

name: Me
text: Like we have a choice!
I took Ange's hand and headed for the mountains behind the school building.

name: Sakura
text: Oh... they left. Ange-chan came here to see her sister again, right? I wonder why she's running around with Fuma-kun.

name: Murasaki
text: Who knows. And why were they dressed up like that?

name: Sakura
text: But, it's kinda like they just popped out of a romantic film. I'm sorta jealous.

name: Murasaki
text: You're too old to say such a thing. Get it together.
Eventually, we decided to hide out in a cave in the northern mountains where a ghost castle had appeared before.
The castle was already gone, and the cave we'd wandered into before had collapsed, but there was another intact cave.
The surrounding atmosphere was as omnious as ever,
and perhaps because nobody thought we would come to a place like this, or perhaps because Sakura-sensei and Murasaki-sensei were holding them back, there were no signs of pursuers.

name: Me
text: Haah, why is this happening to me...

name: Ange
text: I'm sorry.
She didn't sound apologetic in the slightest.
As I let out a sigh, my stomach began to grumble.
It was already night, but I hadn't had anything since noon.

name: Me
text: Haaah, I'm starving...

name: Ange
text: Do you wanna eat a rice ball?

name: Me
text: Do you have one?

name: Ange
text: I brought a bento today.
Ange took out a bento box and a water bottle from somewhere.
I wondered where she could hide such things when she was wearing a wedding dress.
Could it have been the tuxedo and the wedding dress were just figments of our imagination and we're actually dressed normally?
Regardless, Ange pointed at rice balls packed in her bento box.

name: Ange
text: This has salmon, and this one has bonito flake. And this one has sour plum, and this one has cod roe... which do you want?

name: Me
text: I'll take bonito flake.
I picked up one of the rice balls and took a bite.
It was not one from the convenience store, but a homemade rice ball.
It was seasoned with a perfect amount of salt and tasted pretty good.

name: Ange
text: Do you like it?

name: Me
text: Yeah, very much.

name: Ange
text: Glad to hear that. We only have one cup, so let's take turns.
She even poured hot green tea for me.

name: Me
text: Did you make these rice balls by yourself?

name: Ange
text: I did. Om, nom, nom... delicious.
Ange stuffed her face with rice, too.

name: Me
text: You like rice, huh?

name: Ange
text: I love it. It's delicious.
That was good for her. But still...

name: Me
text: In a dark cave, wearing a tuxedo and a wedding dress, having rice balls and green tea... what the heck is this situation?

name: Ange
text: It's kinda weird.

name: Me
text: You're part of this, remember?
Food seemed to make her a little talkative,
and I could finally hear what was going on from Ange.
Ange was one of those modified humans from the UFS with powers of demons or the Taimanin implanted in them.
Since Gosha and some factions of the UFS were in a cooperative relationship, it seemed like she was working as an ambassador for that Masked Taimanin.
And Ange had come to the village for her ambassador job to see Asagi-sensei. I tried to probe further and asked her why she needed to see her, but she didn't answer.
At any rate, it seemed like that fan club, the A-B-G, had formed while she had been frequenting Gosha.
Ange said she had recently found out about the group, but she had decided just to ignore them because all they had been doing was hanging around her at a distance. And they seemed pretty harmless.
But this time, those idiots brought out that pot and used the Goddess Juno, who had been sealed inside, to try and marry Ange.
Since she couldn't just kill the Taimanin allied with the UFS, she was running away from them.
And that's where I got caught up in it.

name: Ange
text: I didn't want to cause trouble.

name: Me
text: You already did.

name: Ange
text: I'm a little bit sorry for you.

name: Me
text: Just a little bit?! You hardly look like you're sorry.

name: Ange
text: I get that a lot. I'm bad at showing emotion.
Ange took a sip from her cup of green tea after she said so with an emotionless face.

name: Me
text: Stop sounding like you're not involved for one thing. But still, they must not have expected Juno to be so vicious.

name: Ange
text: It worked well for me.

name: Me
text: I know you were desperate. Nobody wants to marry those idiots. But I was the one caught in the crossfire here.

name: Ange
text: I'm sorry... Tea?

name: Me
text: Don't think you can put me in a better mood with green tea. Well, not that I won't take it though.

name: Ange
text: Here you are.
I took a sip from my cup of green tea and continued.

name: Me
text: I think you're already aware, but the effect of that blessing is getting stronger.

name: Me
text: My body has already begun to move on its own to protect you, and I'm not sure when the same thing will happen to my mind, either.

name: Ange
text: Are we in trouble?

name: Me
text: Undoubtedly. Don't tell me we're gonna really end up marrying each other...
After thinking for a moment, Ange began to speak nonchalantly.

name: Ange
text: It'll be fine.

name: Me
text: How so?

name: Ange
text: Do you wanna marry me?

name: Me
text: Of course I don't.
I answered with complete certainty.
My mind was still clear enough to do that.

name: Ange
text: Maybe we should just say it then.

name: Me
text: To who?

name: Ange
text: The Goddess Juno. She must be somewhere around us. I'll say it to her too.

name: Me
text: I have a bad feeling about this...
I couldn't feel any sense of her presence, but as Ange had said, Juno must have been somewhere nearby.
We stood up side by side.
Holding each other's hands without realizing it, we began to declare to the walls of the cave.

name: Me
text: I won't marry you!

name: Ange
text: I won't marry you, either!
*Flaaaash!!*

name: Juno
text: Huh? What do you mean by that!?
Juno's divine form had appeared within the cave.
And with a very, very, malicious look on her face.

name: Me
text: What do you mean, "What do you mean!?" Ange and I just met today! Just cancel the curse you put on us!

name: Juno
text: No can do♪ Why don't you just marry each other to entertain me?

name: Juno
text: I need some now that I'm finally released from that tiny, cramped pot!

name: Juno
text: I'm gonna take revenge by forcing a not-so-loving couple to get married!!

name: Me
text: Revenge!? What's that mean!?

name: Juno
text: Revenge on humans who made Juno bless their marriages!

name: Me
text: ...N-Now I got it. This goddess is hopeless.

name: Ange
text: If talking won't work, we have to fight.

name: Me
text: Damn... Looks like there's no other choice.
However, the enemy this time could quite possibly have been a real god.
Could a human really win against a god?

name: Juno
text: Hey, wait! Are you really going to go against the Juno?

name: Juno
text: Fine! I'll give you two a special blessing so you can still be together after I killed you!

name: Me
text: Ohh, I knew you were messed up!
Annoyingly dazzling light began to emanate from the goddess's body as if to express her outrage...
